title: A Final Shaking
description: The date delivered was 07/13/1969. This sermon was preached at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation, informally known as Wabanna. The Atlantic States Christian Convocations were held in the mid 1960s in Wabanna, Maryland. The speakers at the Wabanna conferences were typically, Devern Fromke, T. Austin-Sparks, and Stephen Kaung.

title: Blessedness of the Unoffended
description: The date delivered was 05/01/1959. This message brings to light the stories of Elijah and Elisha, as well as John the Baptist. It is easy to become offended at God when He moves in ways that we do not expect -- especially if He does not seem to be moving at all! But, our heart's cry should be to know Him.  If this is the case, we will never be offended, no matter how "forgotten" we feel. Even our master Jesus exclaimed many times through the gospels 'blessed is he who is not offended in me'.

title: Burning Fire Of The Spirit - Part 1

The Christian Life: A warfare
description: This message was delivered on 05/01/1955. The enemies attack on the Christian will be in four main areas:  Our relationship with the Father. Relationship with the world. Relationship with the Church. Attack on the body. The enemies strategy is to rob the Christian of a "warring spirit". God wants us to maintain a warring spirit toward our enemy.

title: The Controversy of Zion
description: This message was delivered on 07/11/1969 at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation (Wabanna) 1969.

title: The Crisis of our Time
description: This message was delivered on 07/08/1969 at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation (Wabanna) 1969. It is very important for the people of God to know the meaning of the times in which we live. God is always moving forward but He is having to bring His people back from where they have deviated from His intention and plan. Man never really learns anything theoretically. Man really learns anything only by experience. Everything in Christianity depends on the meaning of Jesus Christ. The main thing is a revelation of a Person inwardly. God reveals His Son "in us".

title: The Cross And Emancipation From Circumscribed Horizons
description: This message was delivered on 07/30/1967 at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation (Wabanna) 1967.

title: The Cross And The Battle For Sonship
description: This message was delivered on 07/29/1967 at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation (Wabanna) 1967.

title: The Cross And The Dynamic Of Victory
description: This message was delivered on 07/30/1967 at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation (Wabanna) 1967. The way of victory is the way of the cross. We are to have the same mind and disposition of the Lord Jesus. The Lord Jesus had the capacity or mind to let go. This was the opposite of Satan whose character was one of possessiveness and unlawful ambition. The Lord Jesus emptied Himself and through His cross destroyed the work of the devil. To have the mind of Christ means that we know how to let go of even our own rights. This is the principle of the cross. The climax of the risen life is the cross. The way of victory is through seeing the Lord Jesus, who is greater than all. There is gain out of loss and life out of death.

title: The Cross And The Ministry Of The Unveiled Face
description: This message was delivered on 07/28/1967 at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation (Wabanna) 1967.

title: The Cross And The Two Humanities
description: This message was delivered on 07/27/1967 at the Atlantic States Christian Convocation (Wabanna) 1967.

The Glory Of God - Part 1
description: This message was delivered on 03/01/1966. The life of Jesus Christ was completey regulated and governed by the glory of His Father. Our Lord did everything for the glory of His Father. This can be seen by our Lord's personal secret life with the Father. He did only what He saw the Father doing. The Words and actions of Jesus were governed by the glory of God. The glory of God is that which satisfies the heart of God. It is that which answeres to the mind of the Lord. When things are in line with God's thought then there is the glory.

title: The Glory Of God - Part 2
description: This message was delivered on 03/01/1966. The end of all of God's ways is His glory. It does not always look like this to man, but God is working all things for His glory. We see this in the death of Lazarus. God was in total control of this situation, and the end was that God was glorified in Lazarus being raised from the dead. The end of God's ways and works is glory!! It doesn't always look that way. When God takes anything in hand, the end is going to be His glory. John 11 contains main factors of His ways and works. Incarnation - God becoming flesh. The method of God in redemption. The mystery of God's ways. (Providence). The farsightedness of God. We will only reach God's end only on the pathway of brokeness. True love will only come out of travail. We will only gain through loss. We will not gain anything of value unless it costs us something. The end of all God's ways is glory. There has got to be the basic and utter committal to the Lord. We shall never get beyond the point that there is no more battle for the revelation of the Lord. We must have the attitude of complete committal. Does the Lord have the mastery of your life? Is the Lord glorified in your life? Your job? Your home? Every aspect of your life? There is a sifting coming in the end. "Judgement must begin at the House of God." If your priority in life is the glory of God, then God will bring you into the good of it. God's attitude to humanity at it's best is non-committal. The natural life will not get you through. Only that which is born of God.

title: The Glory Of God - Part 3
description: This message was delivered on 06/01/1966. The glory of God is expressed in the trinity. God the Father is the source of glory. The Father takes personal responsibility for His children to bring them unto glory. Jesus Christ is the Lord of glory. He is the One that is in control to bring forth the glory of God. Jesus Christ is faithful to bring forth all of our adverse circumstances to work for His glory. The Holy Spirit is the Spirit of glory. The Spirit of glory can take hold of the things that would be to our own undoing and turn them for the glory of God.

title: The Grace of God
description: "You can never have the fruit until the blossom is gone, and it takes terrible winds to get rid of the blossom in order to bring on the fruit." If you are in struggles or trials and feel things are not going the way you want them to go. Take the time to listen to this. It is only 22 minutes long delivered by Sparks in 1955, but it is of eternal value for them that has ears to hear. Heb 12:6 For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth, and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth.

What happens when we become Christians
Who Hath Despised The Day Of Small Things
Ye Are Come To Zion - Part 1
description: Part 1 of 8. This highly recommended series deals with entering the rest of Christ and with coming into the full purpose of God for our lives so that the life of Christ may flow to those around us. We are come to Zion, to all the provision we need to live a life like that. We begin here where the history of man begins, in the Garden. Mr. Sparks shows us that Christ is our garden, our resting place, our heritage.

title: Ye Are Come To Zion - Part 2
description: Part 2 of 8. Here we continue on the theme of entering into God's rest, entering into something that God has purposed and perfected in Christ. Entering God's rest doesn't mean we do nothing. So then what are we going to do?

title: Ye Are Come To Zion - Part 3
description: Part 3 of 8. In continuation of our theme of our heritage that is Christ, we deal with where and how we can find the Lord.  How can we be in touch with Him? He would have us be occupied with what occupies Him.

title: Ye Are Come To Zion - Part 4
description: Part 4 of 8. The Cornerstone of Zion is Jesus Christ, and everything is built on and relates to the Cornerstone. This is a challenge to remain focused on this firm foundation and not on the institutions of religion that man has built.

title: Ye Are Come To Zion - Part 5
description: Part 5 of 8. Contrasting Jacob and Zion, here we are shown that Zion is a place of praise, rejoicing, and singing. God delights in mercy but He delights even more in inhabiting the praises of His people. Mr. Sparks takes us on a trip from the wilderness to a place of glory.

title: Ye Are Come To Zion - Part 6
description: Part 6 of 8. Here we deal with the controversy of Zion and Jerusalem. Just as there is always great controversy over Jerusalem here on earth, there is great controversy over Zion in the heavenly places.

title: Ye Are Come To Zion - Part 7
description: Part 7 of 8. We are come unto a heavenly Zion. Chosen to be a part of His heritage in Christ Jesus. Born-again and indwelled by heavenly power. With that new life comes a divine meaning and purpose to our lives, a sense of destiny! Life in the Spirit brings an understanding of this calling.

title: Ye Are Come To Zion - Part 8
description: Part 8 of 8. God will not take rest until righteousness goes forth, for Zion's sake. The Lord's wants a people who share this tremendous concern for this vessel in the earth, this Zion, that expresses His righteousness and glory to the universe. He wants a fire burning in the earth for all nations to see. We must be consumed with this same burden.

title: Ye Are Come Unto Mount Zion
Zion - Embodiment of the Spiritual Values of The Lord Jesus Christ
